derivation: from G1 (ἀσπάζομαι) (as a particle of union) and a presumed form of G4685 (ἀσπάζομαι);
strongs_def: to enfold in the arms, i.e. (by implication) to salute, (figuratively) to welcome
outline:
1. to draw to one's self
    1. to salute one, greet, bid welcome, wish well to
    2. to receive joyfully, welcome
